text: The 2015 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship for Women is the 14th edition of the FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship for Women. 16 teams participate in the competition, being played in Tinajo and Teguise, Spain, from 2 to 12 July 2015. ==Participating teams== * * * * (Winners, 2014 FIBA Europe Women's Under-20 Championship Division B) * (Runners-up, 2014 FIBA Europe Women's Under-20 Championship Division B) * * * * * (3rd place, 2014 FIBA Europe Women's Under-20 Championship Division B) * * * * * * ==First round== The first-round groups draw took place on 30 November 2014 in Budapest, Hungary.Youth Championships Draw In the first round, the sixteen teams are allocated in four groups of four teams each. The top three teams of each group will qualify to the Second Round. The last team of each group will play in the Classification Group G first, then in the 9th–16th place playoffs.Competition System All times are local – Western European Summer Time (UTC+1). ===Group A=== \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group C=== \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group D=== \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Second round== Twelve advancing teams from the First Round will be allocated in two groups of six teams each. The top four teams of each group will advance to the quarterfinals. The last two teams of each group will play for the 9th – 16th places against the teams from the Group G. {| class="wikitable" |- | style="background: #ccffcc; width:20px;" | |Team advances to the Quarterfinals |- | style="background: #ffcccc;" | |Team will compete in the 9th – 16th place playoffs |} ===Group E=== |} \---- \---- ===Group F=== |} \---- \---- ==Classification Group G== Last placed team from each group of first round competes in classification round-robin group for lower four seeds in 9th–16th place playoff. \---- \---- \---- ==Classification playoffs for 9th – 16th place== ===Classification games for 9th – 16th place=== \---- \---- \---- ===Classification games for 13th – 16th place=== \---- \---- ===Classification games for 9th – 12th place=== \---- \---- ==Championship playoffs== ===Quarterfinals=== \---- \---- \---- ===Classification games for 5th – 8th place=== \---- \---- ===Semifinals=== \---- \---- ==Final classification games== ===Match for 15th place=== ===Match for 13th place=== ===Match for 11th place=== ===Match for 9th place=== ===Match for 7th place=== ===Match for 5th place=== ===Bronze medal match=== ===Final=== ==Final standings== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:center;" |- !Rank !width=170|Team !Record |-bgcolor=#ffc | Gold |align=left| |9–0 |-bgcolor=#ddd | Silver |align=left| |8–1 |-bgcolor=#fdb | Bronze |align=left| |6–3 |- |4th |align=left| |5–4 |- |5th |align=left| |5–4 |- |6th |align=left| |4–5 |- |7th |align=left| |4–5 |- |8th |align=left| |4–5 |- |9th |align=left| |5–4 |- |10th |align=left| |5–4 |- |11th |align=left| |5–4 |- |12th |align=left| |4–5 |- |13th |align=left| |3–6 |-bgcolor=#fcc |14th |align=left| |3–6 |-bgcolor=#fcc |15th |align=left| |2–7 |-bgcolor=#fcc |16th |align=left| |0–9 |} {| |} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !Most Valuable Player |- | Leticia Romero |} {| class="wikitable" |- | style="background: #ffcccc; width:22px;" | |Team relegated to 2016 Euro U-20 Division B |} ==Awards== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !Most Valuable Player |- | Leticia Romero |} ===All- Tournament Team=== * Leticia Romero * Laura Quevedo * Marine Johannès * Aby Gaye * Emese Hof ==References== 2015 Category:2015–16 in European women's basketball Category:2015–16 in Spanish women's basketball Category:International women's basketball competitions hosted by Spain Category:2015 in youth sport
